data.title: Learning Not To Swear with Ted Lyde: Leo Benvenuti
data.text:
Comedian, ted lyde, father of a Special Needs Son & a Near Genius Daughter, Hosts a PODCAST that focuses on Life, Marriage and the ART of Moving Forward when you feel so Very Stuck.

Learning Not To Swear with Ted Lyde is a podcast that covers the joys and challenges of coping with a Special Needs child. Coping with Career, Marriage, and all life's challenges while remembering to Laugh and be thankful First... to not let Swearing be the Default response to the hurdles of Living Your Life. We also Review Movies, TV and Streaming Entertainment.
